verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u Then came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָ֨עֵדָ֤ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah [even] the whole congregation מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> mid-bar- into the desert צִן֙ <S%H6790><s%> tzin of Zin בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon, in the first וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev abode הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people בְּקָדֵ֑שׁ <S%H6946><s%> be-ka-Desh; in Kadesh וַתָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> vat-Ta-mot died שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִרְיָ֔ם <S%H4813><s%> mir-Yam, and Miriam וַתִּקָּבֵ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> vat-tik-ka-Ver there and was buried שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah become מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim And there was no water לָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> la-'e-Dah; for the congregation וַיִּקָּ֣הֲל֔וּ <S%H6950><s%> vai-yik-Ka-ha-Lu, and they gathered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh themselves together against Moses וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- against אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron. and against Aaron

וַיָּ֥רֶב <S%H7378><s%> vai-Ya-rev chode הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; with Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and spake לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying וְל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> ve-Lu Would God that גָוַ֛עְנוּ <S%H1478><s%> ga-Va'-nu we had died בִּגְוַ֥ע <S%H1478><s%> big-Va' died אַחֵ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-nu when our brethren לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְלָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> ve-la-Mah Why הֲבֵאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> ha-ve-Tem And why have ye brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> ke-Hal the congregation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar into this wilderness הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this לָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut should die שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, in it אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we וּבְעִירֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H1165><s%> u-ve-'i-Re-nu. that we and our cattle

וְלָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> ve-la-Mah Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-li-Tu-nu And wherefore have ye made us to come up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt לְהָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi to bring אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ta-nu, אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom country הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' us in unto this evil הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; to this לֹ֣א׀ <S%H3808><s%> lo not מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom country זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra', of seed וּתְאֵנָ֤ה <S%H8384><s%> u-te-'e-Nah or of figs וְגֶ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> ve-Ge-fen or of vines וְרִמּ֔וֹן <S%H7416><s%> ve-rim-Mon, or of pomegranates וּמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-Ma-yim neither [is] there any water אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> 'A-yin nor לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <S%H8354><s%> lish-Tot. to drink

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo went מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the presence הַקָּהָ֗ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal, of the assembly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֙תַח֙ <S%H6607><s%> pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed, of the congregation וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu and they fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem; upon their faces וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod- and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. about פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> kach Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּטֶּ֗ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh, the rod וְהַקְהֵ֤ל <S%H6950><s%> ve-hak-Hel and gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֵדָה֙ <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah thou the assembly אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron together thou and Aaron אָחִ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha, thy brother וְדִבַּרְתֶּ֧ם <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Tem and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַסֶּ֛לַע <S%H5553><s%> has-Se-la' ye unto the rock לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem before their eyes וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan and it shall give forth מֵימָ֑יו <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mav; his water וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ta and thou shalt bring forth לָהֶ֥ם la-Hem מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim to them water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> has-Se-la', out of the rock וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-ki-Ta drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּעִירָֽם׃ <S%H1165><s%> be-'i-Ram. and their beasts

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh the rod מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei from before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he צִוָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-hu. as he commanded

וַיַּקְהִ֜לוּ <S%H6950><s%> vai-yak-Hi-lu gathered מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- together פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei together before הַסָּ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> has-Sa-la'; the rock וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'u- unto them Hear נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na now הַמֹּרִ֔ים <S%H4784><s%> ham-mo-Rim, now ye rebels הֲמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> ha-min- at הַסֶּ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> has-Se-la' the rock הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, of this נוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> no-Tzi must we fetch לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. you water

וַיָּ֨רֶם <S%H7311><s%> vai-Ya-rem lifted up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, his hand וַיַּ֧ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַסֶּ֛לַע <S%H5553><s%> has-Se-la' the rock בְּמַטֵּ֖הוּ <S%H4294><s%> be-mat-Te-hu and with his rod פַּעֲמָ֑יִם <S%H6471><s%> pa-'a-Ma-yim; twice וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U came out מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim and the water רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, abundantly וַתֵּ֥שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> vat-Te-shet drank הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah and the congregation וּבְעִירָֽם׃ <S%H1165><s%> u-ve-'i-Ram. and their beasts ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not הֶאֱמַנְתֶּ֣ם <S%H539><s%> he-'e-man-Tem Because ye believed בִּ֔י Bi, לְהַ֨קְדִּישֵׁ֔נִי <S%H6942><s%> le-Hak-di-She-ni, me not to sanctify לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei me in the eyes בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vi-'u therefore ye shall not bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקָּהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal this congregation הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti which I have given לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah This [is] מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mei the water מְרִיבָ֔ה <S%H4809><s%> me-ri-Vah, of Meribah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- because רָב֥וּ <S%H7378><s%> ra-Vu strove בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God וַיִּקָּדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> vai-yik-ka-Desh and he was sanctified בָּֽם׃ Bam. ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses מַלְאָכִ֛ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers מִקָּדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> mik-ka-Desh from Kadesh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech unto the king אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom; of Edom כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, Thou knowest אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַתְּלָאָ֖ה <S%H8513><s%> hat-te-la-'Ah all the travail אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that מְצָאָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-'A-te-nu. that hath befallen

וַיֵּרְד֤וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du went down אֲבֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu How our fathers מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah, into Egypt וַנֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> van-Ne-shev and we have dwelt בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim in Egypt יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim time רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; a long וַיָּרֵ֥עוּ <S%H7489><s%> vai-ya-Re-'u vexed לָ֛נוּ La-nu מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian וְלַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> ve-la-'a-vo-Tei-nu. us and our fathers

וַנִּצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> van-nitz-'Ak And when we cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' he heard קֹלֵ֔נוּ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Le-nu, our voice וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach and sent מַלְאָ֔ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach, an angel וַיֹּצִאֵ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'E-nu and hath brought us forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; out of Egypt וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh now behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we בְקָדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6946><s%> ve-ka-Desh, and behold we [are] in Kadesh עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir a city קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh in the uttermost גְבוּלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Le-cha. of thy border
